channel.title: Help
channel.description:
ok
how can i add items to a shop. what do i search?

how can i make weps attack properly like dds attack like throwing knives i wanna change it so it attacks like a normal dds would
plz help![br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 07, 2008, 01:38:54 PM[/size][hr]how can i change what it says in game
like when u log in!

@kc_pure_816 wrote:

stfu dam nub 1 at a time
add items by open item.java and look for the name of the shop u need then add like 15046:tab:200

change what npc says by opening client.java ctrl+f tpy in what then say then replace with what u wont them to say

ctrl+f customcommand(“home”; //made by find that
follow the steps
lag free del most of your globalobjects

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @xx_d_d_s_xx xx d d s xx
item.description:
@xx_d_d_s_xx wrote:

i can help with what npc says.

go to your npc handler file, and find the npc that you want to change wat says.
and it will look a lil like this

} if (npcs[i].npcType == 558) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Initiate/Proselyte Shop"; }

then where it says
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Initiate/Proselyte Shop”;
change the words that are in quotation to whatever you want it to say, then compile it and bam!

Read full topic
